channel.title: Minecraft Ranks on ShadowNode Modded Game Servers
channel.description: Recent content in Minecraft Ranks on ShadowNode Modded Game Servers

item.title: Ranks
item.description: Available Ranks On the server we have multiple ranks that you can contribute to acquire. The first few include some commands with many being useful and some fun ones included with a few. Also, every rank inherits the commands/features from the previous ranks. Price of each rank is also located on the shop page. Note All ranks have access to their specific prefix in /perks. Meaning if you have example eclipse rank you may use the prefix Member/Shade/Night/Equinox/Eclipse (like hide your rank or use another).
